title: Marvel Adventures The Avengers, Volume 1: Heroes Assembled
description: When global threats surface, they have to contend with the combined might of: Captain America, Storm, Iron Man, The Hulk, Giant-Girl, Wolverine and Spider-Man Still, powers higher-up think their new computerized defenses will be even MORE reliable than our heroes. (Just wish they hadn't named the system ULTRON... ) Collects Marvel Adventures Mighty Avengers #1-4.
author: Jeff Parker
